body: You are adept at numerous disciplines.
name: Multitalented Mastery
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Elves/New Racial Rules/Half-Elven Feats/Multitalented Mastery

sections.body: Character level 5th, half-elf, multitalented racial trait.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: All of your classes are considered favored classes. You gain either +1 hit point or +1 skill point whenever you take a level in any class. Apply these bonuses retroactively for all class levels that have not yet gained one of these bonuses.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: Half-elves with the multitalented racial trait have two favored classes.
sections.name: Normal
